sentences.english: One of the easiest and most dependable ways to get her in the mood is to place your mouth on the back of her neck.
sentences.chinese: 最簡單而又行之有效的一個方法就是吻她的後頸。

sentences.english: Akihiro's hands, on the other hand, were clasped around the photographers nape.
sentences.chinese: 昭洋的手，另一方面，他們緊握着周圍的攝影師後頸。

sentences.english: The hair should be getting lighter, and the scalp should be slightly visible toward the nape of the neck.
sentences.chinese: 在靠近脖子和後頸的部位應該能隱隱約約看到頭皮。

sentences.english: Then Brother Yu kicked Zheng's neck heavily with his left elbow. Followed by a big 'bang! '
sentences.chinese: 那姓餘漢子左肘重重往下一頓，撞在鄭鏢頭的後頸。

sentences.english: The head is whitish with some fine streaking restricted to nape.
sentences.chinese: 頭部全白，僅有一些侷限於後頸的纖細縱紋。

definition: to shake/to fling one's arm/to lash/to swing
triceps brachii (back of the upper arm)
to glower (at sb)/to cast an angry look
to twitch/to throb/a spasm/to extract and use
popliteal (anatomy)/hollow at the back of the knee
